data.name: Stolen Hearts
data.detailed_description:
Stolen Hearts is a puzzle platformer, where you must play as the four main characters to collect all the hearts. Each character has a special ability and must use it to complete the challenging levels in their respective worlds. Each world has very different type of puzzles and challenges. You must complete them all to recollect all the Stolen Hearts. You can also play 4 player local minigames with each of the characters to compete with your friends.





The Good Knight has the special ability to dash giving himself an extra boost on a just, or quickly escape certain death. You must be precise and fast if you plan on beating his levels. He uses his magical lute to open and close gates to navigate to the heart.




Bongo loves to climb walls, but what about when the ceiling is the wall and the wall is the floor. He can play his drum to shift around the gravity to get where he needs to. You have to use his abilities to navigate through his tricky levels.




Elmsley can magically teleport from one spot to another using his old Magician's hat. He plays the organ to rotate the tracks around him. You must carefully place his hat and change the environment to get through to the heart.




The twins can split themselves into two. They always mirror each others actions. But only the older sister can play the saxophone to open and close portal doors. You must to control both twins carefully and use them as a team to be able to collect the heart.

Are you up for the challenge?

data.short_description: A new kind of platformer where you must use you powers to skillfully avoid obstacles and solve puzzles. You have to jump, dash, climb, and teleport you way through each level to collect all of the heart that were stolen by the Evil Dango

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
